title: AI-Based Misconception Detection Instructional Design for Greenhouse Effect Concept Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A course optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments for working adult learners, incorporating an NLP- and machine learning-powered misconception diagnosis system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core concepts related to the greenhouse effect with 90% accuracy.
Learners can diagnose and correct their own conceptual misunderstandings at least three times using AI-based analytical tools.
Learners can improve their conceptual understanding by 20% through peer feedback processes in team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
